name: ANKYLOSAURUS

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The ankylosaurus makes two Tail attacks.

actions.name: Tail
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 10 ft. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.
